__e: I've had some time to think, and I can't go through with this sham marriage.
If you will not, then at least save what is left of me... By chucking in your ridiculous sham of a marriage, as I will mine, And bolting with me to the end of the earth.
What was this whole comedy at your place last night ?
It's like... I realised it was a heavy gig so I've gotta go... if I'm going out with a girl...
So why not end the charade and just let her start living the life she's so capable of.
Why don't we cut the charade and you two tell me what exactly it is you want from me?
